forecast.name: Overnight
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly clear, with a low around 52. West wind around 17 mph, with gusts as high as 21 mph.

forecast.name: Sunday
forecast.detailedForecast: Sunny, with a high near 59. West wind 16 to 23 mph, with gusts as high as 28 mph.

weather_report:
As dawn breaks over Downtown San Francisco, the city awakens beneath a blanket of clear skies. The cool embrace of the night lingers, with temperatures hovering around a crisp fifty-two degrees. A gentle west wind nudges the trees, whispering promises of a sunlit day ahead. As the day takes shape, expect the sun to rise, casting its warm glow over the iconic skyline and the Golden Gate Bridge. By midday, the mercury will climb, brushing against sixty degrees, while the winds invigorate the air, marking a spirited contrast to the tranquil morning.

Looking outwards, the clarity of the atmosphere hints at an inviting day. Any remnants of fog are likely hanging low along the coast, a fleeting whisper of the marine layer that retreats as the sun climbs higher. The day exudes a refreshing vibrancy; ideal for a stroll along the Embarcadero, where the bustle of the ferry building meets the lapping waves, or perhaps a quiet morning at one of the city's beloved cafés. Dressing in layers would be wise, allowing for the coolness of early hours to give way to the pleasant warmth of the afternoon. A light jacket paired with comfortable attire will serve well for the adventures that await. With such splendid conditions, the city beckons for exploration—perhaps a leisurely walk through Golden Gate Park or a visit to the art exhibits that line the streets of the Mission.
